title: "Unexpected error." Am I banned, didn't think I was that toxic lmao.
body:
Tried signing onto my account after a recent update, ran into the seemingly age old "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at (...)". Since then I have tried reinstalling, running as administrator, downloading the hex-tech tool twice (to no avail of a solution) and now I am signing in on someone else network to check if that is the problem. Using someone else's client and network has not worked either, I am still running into this error and not being able to sign in on this specific account. I tried signing in on their account and there were no issues. 
AM I BANNED? I haven't checked my emails but I was able to sign onto my account online and there were no messages or notifications awaiting me so I assume it was not the problem? 

_**PLEASE HELP (I JUST BOUGHT $50 LEAGUE CARD FOR MY CARD STORE AND BY THE LOOKS OF THINGS I WONT BE ABLE TO BUY THEM IN TIME IF EVER I AM BACK ON MY ACCOUNT :/)**_

I have _**3 years**_ or there about on this account and would be tremendously sad to see it all gone :/

replies.body:
**UPDATE:**
So turns out I was unfortunately correct :/ permanent ban bois and grils. I don't know how the rift will continue without me but good luck kids and have fun! (P.S. not too much fun though okay because that will get you a perma ban ;)  ) 

RITO - No hard feelings lads, much sadness that my account is ripperoni though. A lot of money and time went into her :/ make sure you keep her well fed, she doesn't like bronze so shy away from there and please every now and then just take my skinz for spinz pls <3 

See y'all on the rift sometime ;)
Rito pls my people need me
